page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: { The western area of the landscape is mostly housing and industry. The housing is built up right along the main road on both sides. There are two big industries,one is the rubber factory (UNIROYAL) and the second are the quarries. These quarries are sandstone quarries used to build most of the town. Some of the stone was even taken up to Glasgow. There is also a technical college which is a large building and has playing fields too. There is less farmland mostly rough grazing but one or two fields were ploughed up.
